name: Harvey Walters
text:
[reaction] After an investigator at your location draws 1 or more cards from their deck during the investigation phase: That investigator draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.
real_text:
[reaction] After an investigator at your location draws 1 or more cards from their deck during the investigation phase: That investigator draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.
flavor: "I have experience dealing with these sorts of horrors."
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Vault of Knowledge, Thrice-Damned Curiosity, 1 random basic weakness.
back_flavor: Professor Walters began as a devotee of the archaic and obscure, but over the years he has discovered that his knowledge of ancient languages, profane relics, and strange rituals is vital to addressing dangers in the modern day. He is both an avid collector of prehistoric ephemera and a fount of knowledge regarding the bizarre primordial religions that worshipped nightmarish gods eons ago. There is perhaps no sane person alive who knows more about the occult than Harvey. When a supernatural event occurs, Professor Walters brings his considerable resources and experience to bear.

name: Vault of Knowledge
text:
Harvey Walters deck only.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate, exhaust Vault of Knowledge and choose an investigator at your location: That investigator draws 1 card.
real_text:
Harvey Walters deck only.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate, exhaust Vault of Knowledge and choose an investigator at your location: That investigator draws 1 card.

name: Thrice-Damned Curiosity
text: Revelation - For every 3 cards in your hand: Take 1 damage.
real_text: Revelation - For every 3 cards in your hand: Take 1 damage.
flavor:
"... I can only hope that my account will not arouse a curiosity greater than sane caution on the part of those who believe me at all."
- H. P. Lovecraft, "At the Mountains of Madness"

name: Obsessive
text: Revelation - Put Obsessive into play in your threat area. Forced - When your turn begins: Discard 1 non-weakness card at random from your hand. [action] [action]: Discard Obsessive.
real_text: Revelation - Put Obsessive into play in your threat area. Forced - When your turn begins: Discard 1 non-weakness card at random from your hand. [action] [action]: Discard Obsessive.

name: Arcane Enlightenment
text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Tome]] asset.
real_text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Tome]] asset.
flavor: An augmented mind can memorize entire volumes of books.

name: Celaeno Fragments
text:
While you have...
- ...5 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].
- ...10 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [willpower].
- ...15 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].
real_text:
While you have...
- ...5 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].
- ...10 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [willpower].
- ...15 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].

name: Disc of Itzamna
text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Automatically evade that enemy or deal it 2 damage.
real_text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Automatically evade that enemy or deal it 2 damage.
flavor: Do they fear it because of what it will do to them? Or, do they fear it because of what it will do to you?

name: Encyclopedia
text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Encyclopedia and spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.
real_text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Encyclopedia and spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Feed the Mind
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Feed the Mind and spend 1 secret: Test [intellect] (1). For each point you succeed by (to a maximum of 3), draw 1 card.
real_text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Feed the Mind and spend 1 secret: Test [intellect] (1). For each point you succeed by (to a maximum of 3), draw 1 card.

name: Forbidden Tome
text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Forbidden Tome and spend 1 secret: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your hand and there are no secrets on Forbidden Tome, you may discard it to record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the tome."
real_text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Forbidden Tome and spend 1 secret: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your hand and there are no secrets on Forbidden Tome, you may discard it to record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the tome."

name: Higher Education
text:
While you have 5 or more cards in your hand, Higher Education gains:
"[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test."

name: Whitton Greene
text:
While you control a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset, you get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you reveal a location or put a new location into play, exhaust Whitton Greene: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset and draw it. Shuffle your deck.
real_text:
While you control a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset, you get +1 [intellect].

name: Burning the Midnight Oil
text: Investigate. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.
real_text: Investigate. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.

name: Cryptic Writings
text:
Gain 2 resources.
[reaction] After you draw Cryptic Writings during your turn: Play it.
real_text:
Gain 2 resources.
[reaction] After you draw Cryptic Writings during your turn: Play it.
flavor: "...these are few as compared with those in languages I cannot understand." - H. P. Lovecraft, "The Statement of Randolph Carter"

name: Extensive Research
text:
Reduce the cost to play Extensive Research by 1 for each other card in your hand.
Discover 2 clues at your location.
real_text:
Reduce the cost to play Extensive Research by 1 for each other card in your hand.
Discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor:
"Nothing in here, either. How many do we have left?"
"...See the wall behind you?"

name: Occult Invocation
text: As an additional cost to play Occult Invocation, discard up to 2 cards from your hand. Fight. - This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. You get +1 [intellect] and deal +1 damage for this attack for each card discarded as part of this card's cost.
real_text: As an additional cost to play Occult Invocation, discard up to 2 cards from your hand. Fight. - This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. You get +1 [intellect] and deal +1 damage for this attack for each card discarded as part of this card's cost.

text:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.
Draw 3 cards.
real_text:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.

name: Deduction
text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
real_text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
flavor: I knew I had seen this symbol before. I must warn the others before it is too late!

name: Library Docent
text: [reaction] After Library Docent enters play, return a [[Tome]] asset you control to its owner's hand: Play a different [[Tome]] asset (by title) from your hand, reducing its cost by 2.
real_text: [reaction] After Library Docent enters play, return a [[Tome]] asset you control to its owner's hand: Play a different [[Tome]] asset (by title) from your hand, reducing its cost by 2.

name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
text: Draw 1 card. Shuffle any number of non-weakness cards from your hand into your deck. Then, draw that many cards.
real_text: Draw 1 card. Shuffle any number of non-weakness cards from your hand into your deck. Then, draw that many cards.
flavor: Ignorance is a bliss you cannot afford.

name: Esoteric Atlas
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose a revealed location up to 3 connections away from your location. Move to that location.
real_text:
Uses (4 secrets).

name: "I've got a plan!"
text: Fight. This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [intellect] for this test. You deal +1 damage for this attack for each clue you have (max +3 damage).
real_text: Fight. This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [intellect] for this test. You deal +1 damage for this attack for each clue you have (max +3 damage).
flavor: "That's the worst plan I've ever heard. Well, what are we waiting for?"

name: Mind over Matter
text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Until the end of the round, add your [intellect] to your [combat] and [agility]. Draw 1 card.
real_text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Until the end of the round, add your [intellect] to your [combat] and [agility]. Draw 1 card.

name: Seeking Answers
text: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
real_text: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
flavor: Some people need to know the truth at any cost. Some truths can cut like knives.

real_text:

name: Farsight

real_text: [fast] During your turn, if you have 8 or more cards in your hand, exhaust Farsight: Play an event from your hand (paying its cost).
